name: Medieval Malfunction
description:
Play as the robot Mark in a medieval castle looking for his master. Not much more right now story based!

music is janky in web version, please download if you can :) 

Keyboard: 

jump: Z, shoot:X, B:S, Y:A, Left trigger:Q, Right trigger: W

Xbox-controller is self explanatory ;) 

Useful information

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Morse_code
